baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼畜長鉢得經一宿。若過畜者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṁ kareyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya pācittiya 1

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber Almosenschalen anhäuft, muß sie aushändigen und dafür sühnen
Should any bhikkhuni make a bowl-hoard (have more than one bowl in her possession), it is to be forfeited and confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang membuat mangkuk-simpanan (mempunyai lebih dari satu mangkuk dalam kepemilikannya), itu harus di sita dan di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，畜長鉢，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 24

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼多積聚鉢。尼薩耆波逸提(三十)。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 30

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。畜長鉢乃至一夜。過是畜者。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 19

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼畜長鉢尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 14
